tr.com.turkcell.turkcellid
Class TurkcellIdManager

java.lang.Object
  tr.com.turkcell.turkcellid.TurkcellIdManager

public final class TurkcellIdManager
extends Object

This class provides an authentication mechanism. Actual authentication process is performed on server side.
Usage: 

package com.example.app;

 import tr.com.turkcell.turkcellid.TurkcellIdManager;
 import android.app.Activity;
 import android.os.Bundle;
 import android.widget.Toast;


 public class ExampleActivity extends Activity implements TurkcellIdManager.TurkcellIdListener {

        private TurkcellIdManager turkcellIdManager;

        @Override
        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
                super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
                turkcellIdManager = new TurkcellIdManager(this, YOUR_APPLICATION_ID);
                turkcellIdManager.showLoginDialog(this, true);
        }

        @Override
        public void onTurkcellIdAuthorized(String authToken) {
                Toast.makeText(this, "Authorized successfully, authToken: " + authToken, Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show();
        }

        @Override
        public void onTurkcellIdDialogDismissed() {
                Toast.makeText(this, "dialog closed", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
        }

 }

Author:
Ugur Ozmen

Method Detail

showLoginDialog

public void showLoginDialog(TurkcellIdManager.TurkcellIdListener listener,
                            boolean fullScreen)
Displays login dialog. Dialog contents are determined by server and may be not displayed in automatic login is possible. Note: Displayed dialog temporary disables orientation changes.

Parameters:
listener - Listener for dialog callbacks.
fullScreen - true if dialog should be displayed full screen, otherwise it is showed in dialog frame.

logout

public void logout()
Deletes previously stored user credentials if exist.

showChangePasswordDialog

public void showChangePasswordDialog(TurkcellIdManager.TurkcellIdListener listener,
                                     boolean fullScreen)
Displays change password dialog. Dialog contents are determined by server. Note: Displayed dialog temporary disables orientation changes.

Parameters:
listener - Listener for dialog callbacks. TurkcellIdManager.TurkcellIdListener.onTurkcellIdDialogDismissed() is called when dialog is dismissed. Other methods are not used for change password dialog.
fullScreen - true if dialog should be displayed full screen, otherwise it is showed in dialog frame.
